name: Hostel Guys
description:
A third person perspective game inspired by Hostel Daze (A Web Series on Amazon Prime), The player has to collect money from the hostellers by going into there room after collecting the money player need to go to the hostel canteen before hunger meter goes to down to zero. In order to get the food on time. 

Theme - Makes Total Sense : Player doesn't have the money to buy from the canteen, so he makes total sense to get money from his fellow hostellers.

Controls -

 WASD to Move, Forward, Backward, Left & Right.

  • Mouse angle to Rotate Camera.
  • R to Restart
  • Shift + W - Sprint
  • Esc to close the game.

My Discord ID: aksh#3584
